headline.main: Testimony From Jason Nicholas, a Former Employee of Trump University

snippet: In a set of documents unsealed on Tuesday, Mr. Nicholas, a sales executive, recalled a deception used to lure students — that Donald J. Trump would be “actively involved” in their education. “This was not true,” he testified, saying Mr. Trump was hardly involved at all.
lead_paragraph: In a set of documents unsealed on Tuesday, Mr. Nicholas, a sales executive, recalled a deception used to lure students — that Donald J. Trump would be “actively involved” in their education. “This was not true,” he testified, saying Mr. Trump was hardly involved at all.
